DOC.detailed_description: This two-part study . Part I randomize , open-label , three-period crossover study 24 healthy , elderly , male female subject . Subjects allocate one three treatment sequence accord randomization schedule prepare prior start study . Each subject receive single , oral dose three 100 mg capsule droxidopa 240 mL water either fast state ( Treatment A ) immediately follow consumption standardize high-fat meal ( Treatment B ) single , oral dose one 300 mg capsule droxidopa 240 mL water fast state ( Treatment C ) Days 1 , 4 , 7 . Subjects discharge research clinic Day 8 complete posttreatment follow-up assessment return research clinic approximately 1 week later Part II study . Part II study open-label design subject receive three dos 300 mg droxidopa ( three 100 mg capsules/dose ) 4 hour interval follow concurrent 24 h period .
